page.title: 03Recreation 1
page.content:
Allan Park ---------- The Allan Park can be found south of Cults beside the river Dee.It has a pond in the centre of the park which is surrounded by trees.There are football pitches adjacent to the Allan Park.There are swings and a chute for little children.The Allan Park is also host for the cricket club and the 21st A cub pack use the park to play games.
Deeside Golf Club ----------------- The Deeside golf course was opened in 1903 by George Davidson of Wellwood.The course was originally extended to an eighteen hole course.By then the membership was 460 and a new club house was needed.In the last 25 years the course has been lengthened. Now in 1985 it is very attractive.
